func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a frustum given the areas of the top and bottom bases and the height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_frustum

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of painted surfaces of a cone and a frustum.
func_sig.name: calculate_paint_area

radius_frustum_bottom.description: Radius of the bottom base of the frustum.

radius_frustum_top.description: Radius of the top base of the frustum.

func_sig.description: Calculates the area of a circle given its radius.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_circle

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculates the surface area of a cube given the length of an edge.
func_sig.name: calculate_cube_surface_area

edge_length.description: The length of one edge of the cube.
